title: The Shepherd
brief_description: Photographed on the grassy uplands of the British Columbia interior, the ageless theme of a shepherd caring for his flock is presented without spoken commentary. The only sounds heard are those of nature and the barking of two sheep dogs. Seven awards, including: Cork, Ireland; Edinburgh; Johannesburg
